# Departmental Dispensations Certain personnel may require certain [textlink="Controlled Items" link="ControlledItems"] in the course of their job, and as such must be provided exceptions. [bold]Any member of any department which begins their shift with a controlled item in their possession, within their allocated area, or with a departmental lathe capable of producing said controlled item, is assumed authorized for its possession and use.[/bold]
Additionally, tools and equipment located within emergency lockers are not considered [textlink="Controlled Items" link="ControlledItems"], so long as they are used as intended.
